name: Copy Kitty
description: Boki can copy the special abilities of any foe and then combine up to 3 of them into a unique super-weapon! Blast through hordes of evil robots in cyberspace, while training to become a superhero!
minimum_requirements: 最低: OS: Windows XP or Better プロセッサー: Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better メモリー: 512 MB RAM グラフィック: Integrated graphics/256 MB video memory DirectX: Version 9.0c ストレージ: 300 MB 利用可能 サウンドカード: DirectSound compatible 追記事項: Game controller recommended.
